actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution to provide for the authorizing the clerk to inform the President of the United States of the election of the Speaker and the clerk of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Instructs the Clerk to inform the President that the House of Representatives has elected Thomas P. O'Neill, Jr., a Representative from Massachusetts, Speaker, and Edmund L. Henshaw, Jr., of Virginia, Clerk of the House of Representatives of the Ninety-fifth Congress.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the authorizing the clerk to inform the President of the United States of the election of the Speaker and the clerk of the House of Representatives.
